summary: THE METAL PLATE ON THE THROTTLE BODY ASSEMBLY CRACKED CAUSING MY 1997 OLDSMOBILE BRAVADA TO ACCELERATE CONTINUOUSLY TO A SPEED OF 100 MILES PER HOUR.  THE MECHANIC DESCRIBED THE RESULT AS RED LINING.  THIS OCCURRED WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY.  BREAKING ONLY SLOWED THE CAR DOWN MOMENTARILY.     *NLM
